introduction:
hi i'm büyücü and this is a collection of things i've experienced
my ratings are mostly based on personal enjoyment and slightly quality
they are not absolute and may change over time
most things before ~2018 are not included because i don't remember clearly

if a game has an ending and no/low replayability = story game
what counts as a story game or not is debatable
visual novels are not games

the site is still a work in progress so some parts may break or not work
dark reader makes some elements blend in but its generally ok
feel free to add me on other platforms
